728838f-a.text:
Forest Ave., east from Bard Ave.
May 28, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
728838f-a.folder: Forest Avenue & Bard Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728477f-a.text:
Bard Avenue (right), east side, south from Forest Avenue. At the corner of Forest Avenue is the foundation of the Our Savior Lutheran Church. Across the church foundation is an old mansion having belonged to Dr. S. M. Elliott in 1874 and to A.H. Oilby in 1917.
July 5, 1932
P. L. Sperr
728477f-a.folder: Bard Avenue & Forest Avenue, Staten Island, NY

728473f-a.text:
Bard Avenue, east side, adjoining (to the south) City Boulevard. The house was owned by Dr. S. M. Elliott (1874),
and A. H. oilby (1917).
May 28, 1926
P. L. Sperr
728473f-a.folder: Bard Avenue & City Boulevard, Staten Island, NY
